title: In mortem serenissimæ Reginæ Elizabethæ. Nænia consolans.
author: Mulcaster, Richard, 1530?-1611.
publisher: Pro Edwardo Aggas, via longa sub quercu viridi,
notes: Issued with its translation, "The translation of certaine latine verses written uppon her Majesties death, called A comforting complaint" (STC 18252).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
